message: Having some trouble getting this to fire as expected
For one, you have the arguments ordered incorrectly.  setTimeout(func, delay)
Hm, just curious, but why are you using "setInterval" in the first place if you directly clear it after the request? setTimeout seems more like what you need.
funny enough, when i went back to fix the setInterval code, I decided to do just that: used setTimeout, and if the request needs to go again, setTimeout again.
